metadata.title: CVE-2025-23207 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: KaTeX is a fast, easy-to-use JavaScript library for TeX math rendering onthe web. KaTeX users who render untrusted mathematical expressions with`renderToString` could encounter malicious input using `\htmlData` thatruns arbitrary JavaScript, or generate invalid HTML. Users are advised toupgrade to KaTeX v0.16.21 to remove this vulnerability. Users unable toupgrade should avoid use of or turn off the `trust` option, or set it toforbid `\htmlData` commands, forbid inputs containing the substring`"\\htmlData"` and sanitize HTML output from KaTeX.

criterions.comment: node-katex package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
